title: 9.5: Food Romance Interstitial
dc:creator: Jennifer Prokop
description: This week, Adriana Herrera joins us again to talk food romances and Sarah is very excited. Adriana’s debut food romance, American Dreamer, is on shelves now. We talk about the book, the pull of the food romance novel, and why nourishment is sexy. Also, Sarah basically name checks her whole favorites shelf.
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Adriana Herrera joins Sarah and Jen to discuss food romances
